000.Name: The Amazing Marble Race Ticket
000.Description: A ticket to go see The Amazing Marble Race! But... which one?

001.Name: Poup Soop
001.Description: A hole-y drink of Qefpedun origin that contains Poup; acid; lava; rotten flesh and 13 different lethal diseases. Approved by Orange.

002.Name: Limited Edition Poup Soop
002.Description: A special edition of Poup Soop that contains extra Poup; extra acid; extra lava; rotten-er flesh; 14.5 lethal diseases and solid chunks of gold. Approved by Orange.

003.Name: Frozen Edition Poup Soop
003.Description: A special edition of Poup Soop with all the ingredients of regular Poup Soop frozen with solid chunks of ice. Approved by Orange.

004.Name: Orange Edition Poup Soop
004.Description: A special edition of Poup Soop with twice the ingredients of regular Poup Soop and the essence of Orange. Approved by Orange.

005.Name: Electric Edition Poup Soop
005.Description: A special edition of Poup Soop with 20% more lava; 20% more acid and electricity generators inside the barrel. Very good conductor of electricity. Approved by Orange.

006.Name: Burning Edition Poup Soop
006.Description: A special edition of Poup Soop with three times as much lava. Everything including the barrel is flammable and on fire. Approved by Orange.

007.Name: Rotten Edition Poup Soop
007.Description: A special edition of Poup Soop with 6.66 times as much rotten flesh; twice as much acid and 21.25 lethal diseases. Approved by Orange.

008.Name: Ulteymut Edition Poup Soop
008.Description: The final edition of Poup Soop with three times as much Poup; lava and acid; 47.41394 lethal diseases and several classified ingredients. Approved by Orange.

009.Name: Poup Soop Variety Pack
009.Description: Contains 50 of each Poup Soop version currently on sale + Poup Bwedd + Poup Stoo + Poup Joos + HATT MANN action figure. Approved by Orange.

010.Name: Qefpedun Charm
010.Description: A special charm given to those who got dailies in the run up to Orange Day 2019. Imbued with special Qefpedun powers.

011.Name: Old Boot
011.Description: An old boot - once worn long ago...

012.Name: Broken Plastic Bottle
012.Description: A broken plastic bottle which was releasing harmful microplastics into the ocean.

013.Name: Baking Powder
013.Description: A jar containing powdered sodium bicarbonate.

014.Name: Bottle Rocket
014.Description: An explosive plastic bottle that can be used as a weapon. Consumable.

015.Name: Cardboard Wings
015.Description: A pair of wings made from cardboard.

016.Name: Vinegar Bottle
016.Description: A bottle containing an aqueous solution of acetic acid with trace chemicals.

017.Name: Crafting Station Mk.I
017.Description: A workbench providing several different utilities allowing you to craft items.

018.Name: Steel Bucket
018.Description: A bucket made of stainless steel.

019.Name: Water Bucket
019.Description: A stainless steel bucket containing water.

020.Name: Lava Bucket
020.Description: A stainless steel bucket containing lava.

023.Name: Plague Petri Dish
023.Description: A sealed petri dish containing the bacterium *Yersinia pestis*.

024.Name: Nipah Petri Dish
024.Description: A sealed petri dish containing the virus *Nipah henipavirus*.

025.Name: Flu Petri Dish
025.Description: A sealed petri dish containing the virus *Influenza A* subtype H1N1.

026.Name: TB Petri Dish
026.Description: A sealed petri dish containing the bacterium *Mycobacterium tuberculosis*.

027.Name: Aureus Petri Dish
027.Description: A sealed petri dish containing the bacterium *Staphylococcus aureus*.

028.Name: Malaria Petri Dish
028.Description: A sealed petri dish containing the parasite *Plasmodium malariae*.

029.Name: Ebola Petri Dish
029.Description: A sealed petri dish containing the virus *Sudan ebolavirus*.

030.Name: Cholera Petri Dish
030.Description: A sealed petri dish containing the bacterium *Vibrio cholerae*.

031.Name: Tetanus Petri Dish
031.Description: A sealed petri dish containing the bacterium *Clostridium tetani*.

032.Name: Salmonella Petri Dish
032.Description: A sealed petri dish containing the bacterium *Salmonella enterica*.

033.Name: Smallpox Petri Dish
033.Description: A sealed petri dish containing the virus *Variola major*.

034.Name: Measles Petri Dish
034.Description: A sealed petri dish containing the virus *Measles morbillivirus*.

035.Name: Toxoplasmosis Petri Dish
035.Description: A sealed petri dish containing the parasite *Toxoplasma gondii*.

036.Name: Acid Bucket
036.Description: A stainless steel bucket containing hydrofluoric acid.

037.Name: Animal Faecal Matter
037.Description: A polythene bag containing the faeces of an animal.

038.Name: Poop Soup
038.Description: An unholy combination of faeces; lava; acid; rotten flesh and 13 different lethal diseases.

039.Name: Raw Essence of Orange
039.Description: An orange fluid containing the essence of Qefped. Approved by Orange.

040.Name: Poup
040.Description: Qefpedun matter formed of the faeces of an animal endowed with the raw essence of Orange. Approved by Orange.

042.Name: Oak Log
042.Description: A log from an oak tree.

043.Name: Ash Log
043.Description: A log from an ash tree.

044.Name: Elm Log
044.Description: A log from an elm tree.

049.Name: Rope
049.Description: A 4m-long strong cord of twisted nylon strands.

050.Name: Oak Trebuchet
050.Description: A trebuchet made from oak wood and rope. Requires ammo (rocks).

051.Name: Ash Trebuchet
051.Description: A trebuchet made from ash wood and rope. Requires ammo (rocks).

052.Name: Elm Trebuchet
052.Description: A trebuchet made from elm wood and rope. Requires ammo (rocks).

053.Name: Trebuchet Array
053.Description: An array of three trebuchets. Requires ammo (rocks) - uses three per shot.
